```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)



SB_Processed<-read.csv("./processed_data/SB/SB_Processed.csv")
SB_Processed$TIMESTAMP<- as.POSIXct(SB_Processed$TIMESTAMP, 
                                    tz="", format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M")

SB_mutate <- SB_Processed %>%
  mutate(day = date(TIMESTAMP),
         leaf = as.numeric(LWmV_17ft_Avg),
         hour = hour(TIMESTAMP))

SB_mutate$day<- as.factor(SB_mutate$day)


SB_initial_plot<- ggplot(data = SB_mutate,
       aes(x = hour, y = LWmV_17ft_Avg, color = day)) + 
  geom_point() +
  scale_y_discrete(breaks = seq(200, 1000, 100)) + 
  facet_wrap(~day) + 
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90))
SB_initial_plot
```

```{r}
NN_Processed<-read.csv("./processed_data/NN/NN_processed.csv")
NN_Processed$TIMESTAMP<- as.POSIXct(NN_Processed$TIMESTAMP,

NN_mutate <- NN_Processed %>%
```
